```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(pacman)
p_load(formatR, ggplot2, tidyverse, dplyr,  stars, mapview, mapedit,cubeview, sf, units, data.table, dplyr, raster, rasterVis, viridis, ggpubr, rgeos,  exactextractr, knitr, geodata, foreign)
```




```{r}
#wd <- "/home/aniellima/Research/processedData/GeoAltas/市县"
#setwd(wd)

file_list <- list.files("GeoAltas/市县", pattern = "*shp", full.names = TRUE)

shps <- lapply(file_list, read_sf)

all_schools <- do.call(rbind, shps)




all_schools%>%ggplot()+geom_sf(aes(),fill=NA,color="black", size=.1)+
    theme_bw()+
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(size=6))+
  theme(axis.text.y = element_text(size=6))+
  theme(axis.title.x = element_blank())+
  theme(axis.title.y = element_blank())
```
